claim_card.claim: The analysis asserts DeepSeek followed the RGPx grammar without external prompting: Δ statement, GC three-phase expansion, CF contextual synthesis.
claim_card.test_hook: Provide the same initial question without RGPx vocabulary; check whether the response still yields the same structured decomposition.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: DeepSeek’s response follows RGPx grammar without external prompting
